name: PullRequestComments
description: Add comments to a pull request
author: Joachim Dalen

inputs.name: skipIfCommentExists
inputs.label: Do not post comment if it exists
inputs.helpMarkDown: If the comment exists on the pull request, do not post it again

inputs.name: status
inputs.label: Comment Status
inputs.helpMarkDown: Post the comment with a given status

inputs.name: content
inputs.label: Comment Content
inputs.helpMarkDown: The content of the comment. For Markdown syntax, see [Syntax guidance for basic Markdown usage](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=823918)

inputs.name: useDefined
inputs.label: Use defined id
inputs.helpMarkDown: If set, overrides the value from `System.PullRequest.PullRequestId`

inputs.name: pullRequestId
inputs.label: Pull Request Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: If no id is given, the value from `System.PullRequest.PullRequestId` is taken. If a value is given, this overrides the value from `System.PullRequest.PullRequestId`

inputs.name: type
inputs.label: Comment Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: The type of comment. `Text` represents a regular user comment while `System` indicates a system message
